text: Tommy Lee (born October 3, 1962) is an American musician and drummer for the band Mötley Crüe. In 1999 he started a band called Methods of Mayhem. They have released two albums. He has also released two solo albums. He was married to Pamela Anderson from 1995 until they divorced in 1998. They had two sons, Brandon Lee and Dylan. He is a proud dog lover and owns 10 miniature chihuahuas. title: Tommy Lee
